function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of inappropriate HVAC systems for disinfection may lead to ineffective virus control.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spreading due to ineffective temperature and humidity control.","Mitigation":"Implementing suitable HVAC systems and alternative disinfection approaches.","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, air purifiers, UV-C disinfection.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and workers.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and construction professionals."},{"Description":"Survival of COVID-19 virus on various materials may contribute to the spread of the virus.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission through contaminated surfaces.","Mitigation":"Use of antimicrobial materials and surfaces to limit virus survival.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings, copper alloys, and materials with antiviral properties.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and workers.","Owner":"Building owners, architects, and construction professionals."}]}
